name: svg-writer
objective: insert an svg picture in LibreOffice Writer
description: Check if Writer allows to correctly insert an SVG picture
pre_condition: Have an svg picture in your "Home" directory

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar
In the Writer window, click on "Insert"
Click on "From file" in the drop-right menu
In the file manager, select the SVG picture in your home directory

steps.expected: The picture is correctly inserted on your Writer page

author: elebideau

name: svg-calc
objective: insert an svg picture in LibreOffice Calc
description: Check if Calc allows to correctly insert an SVG picture
pre_condition: Have an svg picture in your "Home" directory

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar
In the Calc window, click on "Insert"
Click on "From file" in the drop-right menu
In the file manager, select the SVG picture in your home directory

steps.expected: The picture is correctly inserted on your Calc page

author: elebideau

name: svg-impress
objective: insert an svg picture in LibreOffice Impress
description: Check if Impress allows to correctly insert an SVG picture
pre_condition: Have an svg picture in your "Home" directory

steps.description: Click on "Applications" in the top bar
In the Impress window, click on "Insert"
Click on "From file" in the drop-right menu
In the file manager, select the SVG picture in your home directory

steps.expected: The picture is correctly inserted on your Impress page

author: elebideau

name: google-drive-upload
objective: Export LibreOffice documents to Google Drive
description: Check if LibreOffice documents can be uploaded in Google Drive
pre_condition: Have a Google account, have Writer started and an edited/saved document open

steps.description: Click on "File" in the top-left bar
In the drop-down menu, click on "Google Docs & Zoho"
In the drop-right menu, click on "Export to Google Docs"
steps.expected: A "Export to Google Docs" window opens

steps.description: Fill the "User Name" and the "Password" fields anc check the "Remember Password" case

steps.expected: The document is successfully uploaded in Google Drive

author: elebideau

name: google-drive-download
objective: Import LibreOffice documents from Google Drive
description: Check if LibreOffice documents can be downloaded from Google Drive
pre_condition: Have a Google account, have Writer started

steps.description: Click on "File" in the top-left bar
In the drop-down menu, click on "Google Docs & Zoho"
In the drop-right menu, click on "Import from Google Docs"
steps.expected: A "Import from Google Docs" window opens

steps.description: Fill the "User Name" and the "Password" fields anc check the "Remember Password" case

steps.expected: A document list appears down to the button

steps.description: Select the Writer document to be imported

steps.expected: The document is successfully imported on the computer

author: elebideau

name: pdf-export-writer
objective: export LibreOffice Writer documents to PDF
description: Check if Writer documents are correctly exported into PDF format
pre_condition: Have a Writer document created, edited and open

steps.description: Click on "File" in the top-left bar

steps.expected: The document has been correctly exported into a PDF format in the selected directory

author: elebideau

name: pdf-export-calc
objective: export LibreOffice Calc documents to PDF

pre_condition: Have a Calc document created, edited and open

steps.description: Click on "File" in the top-left bar

steps.expected: The document has been correctly exported into a PDF format in the selected directory
